vanced.changelog:
22-07-2023

Patches: 2.186.0
  [2.186.0] 


 Bug Fixes

- Tiktok - Settings: get instruction registers dynamically  
- YouTube - Spoof app version: update target app version description  
- YouTube - Theme: allow setting no background color 
- YouTube - Theme: apply custom seekbar color to shorts  


 Features

- Twitter: remove Hide view stats patch 
- Youtube - Theme: add a switch to enable/disable custom seekbar color  




 
Integrations:   [0.114.0] 
 Bug Fixes
- Tiktok - Settings: check for null when opening ads settings  
 Features
- youtube/theme: add a switch to enable/disable custom seekbar color  
 
 
CLI:   [2.23.0] 
 Features
- rip-lib and unsigned 
 

YouTube version: 18.23.35

music.changelog:
24-07-2023

Patches: 2.186.1
 YouTube
==
- feat: add support version v18.27.35
- feat: add hide-suggested-video-overlay patch  feat: change video-speed to playback-speed  feat: generate an exception when an invalid options is entered
- feat: apply custom seekbar color to shorts  feat: hide new type of ads
- feat: change the default value of Hide expandable chip under video  feat: shorts header is not blocked on some shorts shelves [ScreenShot]
- fix: takes too long to apply the patch in the RVX Manager
- fix: Disable playlist autoplay loops video in minimized and PiP mode  fix: dislikes not showing in some situations  fix: some segments skipping slightly too late   feat: update translation
Arabic
